Synopsis: Creates a new message for a specified thread in the OpenAI API.
Description: The New-OAIMessage function creates a new message for a specified thread in the OpenAI API. It allows you to specify the thread ID, role, content, attachments, and metadata for the message.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-OAIMessage -ThreadId "12345" -Role "user" -Content "Hello, how can I help you?"
This example creates a new user message with the content "Hello, how can I help you?" for the thread with ID "12345".
